name: Steamboat Willie
description:
Welcome to a bone-chilling horror experience set a world inspired by the iconic Steamboat Willie cartoon and Slender: the eight pages. You are a daring cargo collector, navigating through an eerie forest, collecting valuable cargo while desperately avoiding the nightmarish duo, Mickey and Minnie.

Once beloved characters, Mickey and Minnie have transformed into strange entities, their hollow eyes and eerie smiles haunting your every move.

Your objective is simple: Collect valuable cargo scattered throughout the forest and return them to the dock inside a timeframe, while trying to not get caught.

Keep quiet and everything should be alright.
